trends: There have been 9 other sightings in St Catharines
There were no other sightings in St Catharines on or around January 1st 2000
divs: Sighting Details We were walking west along the south shore of Lake Ontario. I first noticed the object off in the distance and thought it was a star off in the distance. I was more currious than anything when I first saw it. It started moving around then hovering. It appeard to touch the lake then went up into the air and broke into several pieces. They were brighly lite and continualy changed colours. I thought it might have been an aircraft until I saw a air plane fly behind it. I lost site of them when they took off a a fast speed.
